page.title: 01Our Area
page.content: Our area is mainly farmland.It covers the northern edge of Wellington, Apley Park, and part of the parish of Eyton-on-the-Wealdmoors.There is a small area of woodland and a new housing development.A new hospital is being built and a factory and improved road system have recently been opened. At Dothill there are blocks of flats as well as houses and the area contains two pools which are homes for swans.At Hadley there is a long-established factory and features of historical interest.At Apley there is a nursery on the site of an old house.
